     
    		Join Us at the College of Business
    	Chico State’s College of Business is one of just 15 percent of all business schools in the world that meet the rigorous standards for accreditation by the Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business International (AACSB International).We are a community that cares – instructors, alumni, recruiters all agree that Chico State’s College of Business is Company Worth Keeping. We can’t wait for you to join us!Refer a FriendDo you want to win $10,000? Refer a first-time freshman or transfer student to enroll in the College of Business and be entered into a drawing for fall 2023! In order to be eligible for the drawing, the referred student must be enrolled as a new student in Fall 2023 and a declared business major. The drawing will take place in September 2023. Refer a friend to the College of Business today!Apply to Chico State
                        Undergraduate Programs
                    
                        Masters of Business Administration
                    
                        Learn More About the COB
                    U.S. News & World Report has ranked Chico State a top 10 U.S. public university in the West for over a decade. With one of the lowest average student debt amounts in the country, Chico State offers one of the nation’s highest return on investment.Apply to Chico StateReasons to Get a Business Degree at Chico StateWe are invested in your early career success.Our alumni are proud of their Chico State Business degree, and employers love hiring them because they are entrepreneurial problem solvers, collaborative team players and leaders, and are ready for professional life.6,000 business-oriented internships.82% are placed in terrific jobs.Yearly average earnings of $60k.Companies Love Hiring Our GradsA few companies who have hired College of Business graduates:We are nationally ranked.California State University, Chico and the College of Business continue to be recognized as a leader in quality education."The College of Business has set me on a path of early career success that I’m absolutely positive would not have happened at any other university." — Ryan B.College of Business In The News
                        Distinguished Alum and Nonprofit Chair Marti Sutton

We educate students one individual at a time, and the result is Company Worth Keeping.

We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
